nodes.desc: Downloads an image from a given URL.
Downloads a video from a given URL.
Downloads an audio file from a given URL.
Downloads the text content from a given URL.
Searches for a specific text or keyword on the internet.
Searches for images on the internet based on a given query.
Performs a similar image search using an input image.
Extracts URL from text
Searches for videos on the internet based on a given query.
Generates an image based on a given text description.
Generates a video based on a given text description.
Generates an audio file based on a given text description.
Extracts text from an input image using Optical Character Recognition (OCR).
Transcribes speech from an audio file into text.
Transcribes speech from a video file into text.
Reduces background noise or unwanted sounds from a given audio file.
Applies various audio effects to a given audio file according to human instruction, such as reverb, chorus, or equalization.
Combines two audio files into a single output file.
Modifies the characteristics of a recorded voice according to human instruction, such as tone, pitch, or gender.
Summarizes a given text into a shorter version while retaining the main points.
Translates a given text from one language to english.
Analyzes the sentiment of a given text, identifying if it is positive, negative, or neutral.
Checks a given text for grammatical errors and suggests corrections.
Rewrites a given text in a simpler and more understandable manner.
Expands a given short text into a more detailed and descriptive version.
Extracts the most important keywords and phrases from a given text.
Rewrites a given text using different words while maintaining its original meaning.
Rewrites a given article using synonyms and syntax changes to create a new, unique version.
Generates a list of relevant topics or ideas based on a given input.
Generates an image that visually represents a given audio, such as a waveform or spectrogram.
Creates a slideshow video using two input images.
Extracts the audio track from a given video file.
Extracts a still image from a given video.
Stitches together two input images to create a panorama or collage.
Adds color to a black and white input image using deep learning techniques.
Applies the visual style of one image (style) to the content of another image (content) using neural style transfer techniques.
Stabilizes a shaky input video to produce a smoother output video.
Adjusts the playback speed of a given video according to human instruction, either speeding it up or slowing it down.
Synchronizes the timing of an existing voiceover or audio file with the visuals of a given video.
Adds a voiceover to a given video using a provided script or text.
